message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I believe this deal will be mutually beneficial. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am proposing to purchase the product for $950,000. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $950,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This still leaves a good profit margin for you and allows me to get closer to my desired price. Let's meet in the middle.

I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose purchasing the product for $1,000,000. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our interests.
